definition: ملق mulqin: ملقيات الألغام البحرية mulqiyāt al-a. al-baḥrīya mine layers ملق maliqa a (malaq) to flatter (ه s.o.) U = I; to even, level, plane (هـ هـ s.th.) III = I IV to become poor, impoverished, be reduced to poverty V to flatter (الى, ل or ه s.o.) ملق maliq and ملاق mallāq flatterer, adulator ملق malaqa pl. -āt, املق amlaq (eg.) Egyptian mile, league, the distance of approximately one hour’s walk
